rukus.text: 20|1|tba-ha
20|2|ami tomaka dukha-kastata patita karaibalai tomara prati e'i kora'ana aratirna karaa na'i
20|3|baram yiye bhaya karae tara babe upadesa sbaraupa (aratirna karaicho)
20|4|yijane prthirai arau su'ucca akasasamuha srsti karaiche te'omra taraphara paraa nayilakrta
20|5|parama karaunamaya (rahamana) arachara oparata uthiche.
20|6|Akasasamuha, prthirai arau e'i duyora majata yi ache lagate bhugarbhata yi ache se'i sakalo te'omrae'i.
20|7|Arau yadi tumi ucca kanthata katha koraa (yadi'o iyara kono prayojana na'i), tente (jani thoraa) te'om gopana arau ati gopana sakalo bisaye jane.
20|8|Allaha, te'omra bahirae ana kono satya ilaha na'i, sundara namasamuha kerala te'omrae'i.
20|9|Arau muchara brttanta tomara ocarata ahi pa'ichene

20|10|te'om yetiya ju'i dekha pale tetiya te'om nija paraiyalabargaka ka’le, ‘tomaloke apeksa karaa, niscaya ma'i ju'i dekha pa'icho. Asa karao ma'i tomalokara babe tara paraa alapa jbalanta enara aniba paraima na'iba ju'ira ocarata kono pathanirdesa paba parao’.
20|11|Yetiya te'om ju'ira ocara ahi pale tetiya te'omka ahbana karaa ha’la, ‘he mucha
20|12|‘niscaya maye'i tomara raba, eteke tomara jotayora khuli peloraa, karana tumi etiya paraitra toraa upatyakata acha.
20|13|‘Arau ma'i tomaka manonita karaicho. Seye yi ahi praerana karaa haya seya manoyoga sahakarae suna.
20|14|‘Niscaya maye'i allaha, mora bahirae ana kono satya ilaha na'i. Eteke kerala morae'i ibadata karaa arau mora smaranarthe chalata kayema karaa.
20|15|‘Niscaya kiyamata arasyambharai, ma'i e'ito gopana raakhiba bicarao yate pratyekake nija nija cesta-sadhana anuyayi pratidana diya yaya.
20|16|‘Eteke yi byakti kiyamatara prati imana posana nakarae arau nija prabrttira anusarana karae, si yena tomaka iyara prati imana anara paraa birata naraakhe, an'yatha tumi dhbansa hai yaba.
20|17|‘Arau he mucha! Tomara som hatata se'ito ki’
20|18|te'om ka’le, ‘e'idala mora lakhuti, iyara oparata ma'i bhara di'om, arau iyara dbaraa ma'i mora chagaliborara babe gachara pata saraa'om lagate e'idala mora an'yan'ya kamato ahe’.
20|19|Allahe ka’le, ‘he mucha! Tumi e'idala (matita) niksepa karaacona’.
20|20|Tara pichata te'om se'idala niksepa karaile, lage lage seya edala sapa hai dauraiba dharaile
20|21|allahe ka’le, ‘tumi e'ito dharaa, bhaya nakaraiba, ami iyaka iyara agara arasthata ubhata'i dima.
20|22|‘Arau tumi tomara hatakhana kasalatita raakha, seya arau eta nidarsanasbaraupa kono dharanara trautibihina ujjbala hai ola'i ahiba.
20|23|‘E'ito e'i babe ye, ami tomaka amara kichumana mahana nidarsanarali dekhuraama.
20|24|‘Phira'a'unara ocarata yoraa, niscaya si simalanghana karaiche’.
